name: blogsmith-free
title: Blogsmith Free
desc: A free blog theme with many features and utilities to jumpstart your website. Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4.
article:
Save weeks of time and get a blog up and running in a snap.

Blogsmith is the perfect way to showcase your writing and connect with your audience. It's built on Astro with Tailwind CSS for styling.

Features

  • MDX blog
  • Incredibly easy navbar configuration
  • Admonition / Callout component
  • Blog posts pagination
  • Categories
  • Multiple author support
  • Relevant SEO metadata
  • View Transitions enabled
  • Built-in image optimization with astro:assets
  • Sitemap and RSS feed
  • Legal and other pages

Blogsmith Pro

There is also a pro version with many additional features available which you can check out here

github.name: blogsmithfree
github.description: A free and open source blog template by Cosmic Themes. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS.
